resources:
Samfantozzi Settings
//settings Server name. Server name to which you want to connect, for example www.edcom.sk, without http:\\ Mail username. Mail - username for login to Firebase. User password. Password for login to Firebase. Number of company. Number of company to which you want to connect. Accounting year. Accounting year for attendance. Accounting month. Accounting month for attendance. You can change in All Eployees Absences activity Type of User. Set App by login. Admin, common user.... UID of User. Set App by login. UID of user.... User is admin. 0=no, 1=yes Company of User. ID of Company where user work. ID number of User. ID number of User at Company where user work. User at work. 1-user at work, 0-user leave work. Name of user. Name of logged user.
